de.engehausen.kongcurrent.cglib
Class DescriptionCglib<T>

java.lang.Object
  de.engehausen.kongcurrent.Description<T>
      de.engehausen.kongcurrent.cglib.DescriptionCglib<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of class the description describes
public class DescriptionCglib<T>
extends Description<T>

Description of a class to monitor. This extends the Description used for interfaces and can be used with classes that will be proxied (actually subclassed) using cglib. Additionally the description provides further descriptions for methods returning objects that somehow depend on the original instance.

Method Detail

addDependant

public <E> void addDependant(DescriptionCglib<E> description,
                             String methodName,
                             Class<?>... parameterTypes)
                  throws SecurityException,
                         NoSuchMethodException
Adds a method as a "dependant" to the description. This means that if this method is invoked, the result object should be monitored as well, because it is depending on the parent object in some way. Once the description object is used through Monitor, directly or indirectly, this method must not be used any more.

Type Parameters:
E - the type the description stands for
Parameters:
description - the cglib-based description applicable for the return type of the method, must not be null.
methodName - the name of the method, must not be null.
parameterTypes - the types of arguments to the method, may be null.
Throws:
SecurityException - if a security manager denies access
NoSuchMethodException - if a matching method is not found

getConstructorInformation

public ConstructorInformation<T> getConstructorInformation()

information on the constructor of an object to proxy.
